statements: DELETE FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_name = 'Example Task';
DELETE FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_id = 100 AND schedule_time < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_name LIKE '%cleanup%' AND repeat_interval >= INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM OtherTable WHERE status = 'completed');
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE task_name = 'Example Task';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE task_name = 'Meeting' AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE task_type = 'Daily' AND task_frequency = INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE task_name = 'Project' AND end_time < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM lights_schedule WHERE id = 1 AND start_time < NOW();
DELETE FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
DELETE FROM logs WHERE action = 'login' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LightSchedules WHERE light_id = 101 AND schedule_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Tasks WHERE is_enabled = FALSE;
